attributes.comment:
I should say the USCIS is very low efficiency on case processing. My I-485
application has been pending for 2 years and no any progress at all. Every time
when I check with USCIS, the answer is pending on name check, please wait.
They decline to give a clearly time frame they can complete the process.
I am a legal tax payer here, and specifically USCIS is living on the immigrants.
But we can't get any fair and guarenteed sevice from them. That's unfair and not
correct in such called equity United States.
The immigration application fees already increased a lot compare with serveral
years ago. But the service from USCIS didn't improve at all, I should say it
become worse and worse. I have been waiting for my green card for 5 and half
years, and it's normal, lots of my friends waiting for even longer. The waiting time
for the green cared is history long now. Increasing the fee just make the
immigrants more like the slaves, and the officer get more reasons to become lasy
since the money comes so easy.
So the only way to improve USCIS service is to find a method to provent the
govement from abusing their power, not increasing the fees.

Best regards,

Yong
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Yong Peng
